ECDSAInvalidSignatureLength(uint256).details: The signature has an invalid length.

ECDSAInvalidSignatureS(bytes32).details: The signature has an S value that is in the upper half order.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

BuyerFeeAmountChanged(uint256,uint256).details: event that's emitted when ProtocolFeeData buyerAmount changes

EIP712DomainChanged().details: MAY be emitted to signal that the domain could have changed.

FeeReceiverChanged(address,address).details: event that's emitted when ProtocolFeeData receiver changes

Initialized(uint64).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

SellerFeeAmountChanged(uint256,uint256).details: event that's emitted when ProtocolFeeData sellerAmount changes

directAcceptBid((address,uint256,bytes4,.details: function, generate sellOrder and buyOrder from parameters and call validateAndMatch() for accept bid transaction

params.direct: struct with parameters for accept bid operation

directPurchase((address,uint256,bytes4,b.details: function, generate sellOrder and buyOrder from parameters and call validateAndMatch() for purchase transaction

eip712Domain().details: returns the fields and values that describe the domain separator used by this contract for EIP-712 signature.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
